definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: But there also have some Warring States Period documents in the spreading process sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 但在流传过程中也间杂有一些战国史料。

sentences.english: Historical materials of reclaim and cultivate in Kaiyuan and Mengzi district, Yunnan Province are mainly preserved in Yunnan Archives.
sentences.chinese: 云南开蒙垦殖的史料主要保存在云南省档案馆。

sentences.english: The piling up of sheer historical fact about the Galilean, however, is not sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 光是把有关耶稣的史料堆积起来是不够的。

sentences.english: This article specially discusses this content based en seme scattered reliable historical materials.
sentences.chinese: 本文依据一些散见的可靠史料专门论述这一内容。

sentences.english: According to the historical record, the custom of tea-drinking occurred in the Wesrern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 据史料记载，西汉时期已经有了饮茶的习俗。

sentences.english: This paper is based on historical material of the Tang dynasty and tries to clarify the question.
sentences.chinese: 本文从唐朝的史料出发，力图就此问题进行考察。

sentences.english: Within these materials, several pieces provide us historical materials to rearrangement Wang Shu's individual resume.
sentences.chinese: 其中，有多篇奏章能为我们提供整理王恕履历的史料。

sentences.english: Due to the lack of historical reference, there exists a puzzle about Liu Zongyuan's marriage.
sentences.chinese: 柳宗元的婚姻问题，由于缺乏史料存在未解之谜。

sentences.english: Mongolian people don't have many written historical records.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古人没有多少文字史料。

sentences.english: Folk culture can always provide us with the truest social history materials.
sentences.chinese: 民间文艺往往能提供最正确的社会史料。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the part of the case studies of historical materials in MoZi.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为《墨子》中史料的个案研究部分。

sentences.english: The music historical materials of Collected Rhymeprose of Han dynasty is discussed and analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对《全汉赋》音乐史料进行探讨和分析。

sentences.english: In the first chapter, we mainly discuss the state of authors' biography.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要论述魏晋时期作家传记史料的情况。

sentences.english: Both the quantity and quality of the Chinese historical earthquake records rank forefront in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我国的地震史料在质和量方面都居世界前列。

sentences.english: However, his life story is seldom discovered in the historical documents.
sentences.chinese: 可是他的生平事迹却很少见诸史料记载。

sentences.english: The last explosive eruption of the volcano, based on historical records, occurred in 1877.
sentences.chinese: 据史料记载，这座火山最近一次喷发是在1877年。

definition: the 24 or 25 official dynastic histories/true history, as opposed to fictional adaptation or popular legends
History of the Ming Dynasty, twenty fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhang Tingyu 張廷玉|张廷玉[Zhang1 Ting2 yu4] in 1739 during the Qing Dynasty, 332 scrolls
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
annals of the Ming Dynasty 明朝[Ming2 chao2] (1368-1644)

Draft History of the Qing Dynasty, sometimes listed as number 25 or 26 of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhao Erxun 趙爾巽|赵尔巽[Zhao4 Er3 xun4] in 1927 during the Northern Warlords period, 536 scrolls
general history of a county/county annals
